definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
employee/person employed in a trade or profession

sentences.english: Non-codependent love requires wholeness to emerge within.
sentences.chinese: 不再相互依赖的爱，需要从内在出现完整。

sentences.english: I just came from a fruit market.
sentences.chinese: 我刚从一个水果市场来。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使计算机能够从文本中提取意义的过程。

sentences.english: CATV signals travel strightyly high up into the space from TV stations.
sentences.chinese: 有线电视信号从电视台直接送入空间。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: The cunning thief stole the money out of the man's pocket.
sentences.chinese: 狡滑的小偷从那位男士的口袋里偷了钱。

sentences.english: And Trump's governing concept shows a strong inclination toward neo-isolationism.
sentences.chinese: 从其执政理念看，新孤立主义倾向明显。

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯从1982年起就一直在语言学院工作。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 这位新总理主要从年轻人中物色人选组建政府。

sentences.english: He rode on, blood flowing from his side.
sentences.chinese: 他骑灭马，陈血从腰部流上去。

sentences.english: All you have to do to win is unscramble the words here to find four names of birds.
sentences.chinese: 只要你能从这些单词中找到四种鸟的名称你就赢了。

sentences.english: Then, from Tuesday afternoon through Thursday, the stars send intense and beautiful energy your way.
sentences.chinese: 从周二下午到周四，巨蟹宫将会释放强劲的能量。

sentences.english: Cosette had emerged from under the table.
sentences.chinese: 珂赛特从桌子底下钻出来。

sentences.english: Yu from East Jiangzhou down to the Three Gorges, Three Gorges will begin dredging project.
sentences.chinese: 禹从江州东下来到了三峡，便开始疏浚三峡的工程。

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to come and see/to see a topic from a certain point of view
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
